65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated `Uqba bin Sahban:`Abdullah bin Mughaffal Al-Muzani who was one of those who witnessed (the event of) the tree, said, "The Prophet (ﷺ) forbade the throwing of small stones (with two fingers)

chapter.eng-name: The Statement of Allah the Most High: "...When they gave their Bai'a (pledge) to you (O Muḥammad ﷺ) under the tree..." (V.48:18)
